sen.j: 渟名底仲媛命（ぬなそこなかつひめのみこと）は、安寧天皇の皇后。
sen.e: Nunasokonakatsuhime no mikoto was the Empress of Emperor Annei.
Nunasokonakatsuhime no mikoto was the Empress of Emperor Annei.
Nunasokonakatsuhime no mikoto was the Empress of Emperor Annei.

sen.j: 息石耳命と懿徳天皇と磯城津彦らの生母。
sen.e: She was the real mother of Ikisomimi no mikoto, Emperor Itoku, Shikitsuhiko, and others.
She was the real mother of Ikisomimi no mikoto, Emperor Itoku, Shikitsuhiko, and others.
She was the real mother of Ikisomimi no mikoto, Emperor Itoku, Shikitsuhiko, and others.
In the main text of "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan), she appears as the Empress.
In the main text of "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan), she appears as the Empress.
In the main text of "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan), she appears as the Empress.
She is also mentioned as Nunasohime.
She is also mentioned as Nunasohime.
She is also mentioned as Nunasohime.
She was the daughter of Kamoo who was the son of Kotoshiro nushi (a Japanese ancient god).
She was a daughter of Kamoo who was a son of Kotoshiro nushi (a Japanese ancient god).
She was a daughter of Kamoo who was a son of Kotoshiro nushi (a Japanese ancient god).
Her mother was unknown.
Her mother was unknown.
Her mother was unknown.
In the third year of Emperor Annei's reign, she was ascended to be the Empress.
sen.cmt: 安寧3年→the third year of Emperor Annei's reignとしました。
sen.e: In the third year of Emperor Annei's reign, she ascended to be the Empress.
In the third year of Emperor Annei's reign, she ascended to be the Empress.

sen.j: 『先代旧事本紀』では「三世孫 天日方奇日方命 亦名 阿田都久志尼命 此命娶日向賀牟度美良姬 生一男一女 兒 健飯勝命 妹 渟中底姬命 此命 片鹽浮穴宮天皇 安寧 片鹽浮穴宮 或本坐輕地曲峽宮 立為皇后 誕生四兒 即 大日本根子彥耜友天 懿德 次 常津命 次 磯城津彥命 次 手研彥奇友背命也」とあり渟中底姬命といい、天日方奇日方命の娘。
sen.e: In "Sendai Kujihongi" (Ancient Japanese History), she is described as the daughter of Amehikatakushihikata no mikoto, called Nunasokohime no mikoto, as the following phrase describes:三世孫 天日方奇日方命 亦名 阿田都久志尼命 此命娶日向賀牟度美良姬 生一男一女 兒 健飯勝命 妹 渟中底姬命 此命 片鹽浮穴宮天皇 安寧 片鹽浮穴宮 或本坐輕地曲峽宮 立為皇后 誕生四兒 即 大日本根子彥耜友天 懿德 次 常津命 次 磯城津彥命 次 手研彥奇友背命也 (意味不明のため訳出不能).
sen.cmt: 天日方奇日方命→Amehikatakushihikata no mikotoとしました。 「三世孫 天日方奇日方命 亦名 阿田都久志尼命 此命娶日向賀牟度美良姬 生一男一女 兒 健飯勝命 妹 渟中底姬命 此命 片鹽浮穴宮天皇 安寧 片鹽浮穴宮 或本坐輕地曲峽宮 立為皇后 誕生四兒 即 大日本根子彥耜友天 懿德 次 常津命 次 磯城津彥命 次 手研彥奇友背命也」→意味不明のため訳出できませんでした：(三世孫 天日方奇日方命 亦名 阿田都久志尼命 此命娶日向賀牟度美良姬 生一男一女 兒 健飯勝命 妹 渟中底姬命 此命 片鹽浮穴宮天皇 安寧 片鹽浮穴宮 或本坐輕地曲峽宮 立為皇后 誕生四兒 即 大日本根子彥耜友天 懿德 次 常津命 次 磯城津彥命 次 手研彥奇友背命也)
sen.e: In "Sendai Kujihongi" (Ancient Japanese History), she is described as a daughter of Amehikatakushihikata no mikoto, called Nunasokohime no mikoto, as the following phrase describes:三世孫 天日方奇日方命 亦名 阿田都久志尼命 此命娶日向賀牟度美良姬 生一男一女 兒 健飯勝命 妹 渟中底姬命 此命 片鹽浮穴宮天皇 安寧 片鹽浮穴宮 或本坐輕地曲峽宮 立為皇后 誕生四兒 即 大日本根子彥耜友天 懿德 次 常津命 次 磯城津彥命 次 手研彥奇友背命也 (意味不明のため訳出不能).
sen.cmt: daughterの冠詞をthe からaに変更
sen.e: In "Sendai Kujihongi" (Ancient Japanese History), she is described as a daughter of Amehikatakushihikata no mikoto, called Nunasokohime no mikoto, as the following phrase describes:三世孫 天日方奇日方命 亦名 阿田都久志尼命 此命娶日向賀牟度美良姬 生一男一女 兒 健飯勝命 妹 渟中底姬命 此命 片鹽浮穴宮天皇 安寧 片鹽浮穴宮 或本坐輕地曲峽宮 立為皇后 誕生四兒 即 大日本根子彥耜友天 懿德 次 常津命 次 磯城津彥命 次 手研彥奇友背命也 (意味不明のため訳出不能).

sen.j: なお、『古事記』での皇后は、師木県主波延の娘 阿久斗比売、 『日本書紀』第1の一書での皇后は磯城県主葉江の娘である川津媛、第2の一書での皇后は大間宿禰の娘である糸井媛。
sen.e: On the other hand, in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters), the Empress is Akutohime, the daughter of Shiki no agatanonushi Hae, while in the 'alternate writing 1-1'transmitted by the Nihonshoki, the Empress is Kawatsuhime, the daughter of Ishiki no agatanonushi Hae, and in the 'alternate writing 2-1,' Itoihime, the daughter of Oma no sukune.
sen.cmt: 師木県主波延→本文下方に同音異漢字表記の名前が出てくるため、Shiki no agatanonushi Hae (波延)と漢字表記を入れました。 『日本書紀』第1の一書→定訳不明：the 'alternate writing 1-1' transmitted by the Nihonshokiとしました。 『日本書紀』→既出のため、the Nihonshokiとしました。 磯城県主葉江→本文上方に同音異漢字表記の名前が出てくるため、Ishiki no agatanonushi Hae (葉江) と漢字表記を入れました。 第2の一書→定訳不明：the 'alternate writing 2-1' としました。
sen.e: On the other hand, in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters), the Empress is Akutohime, the daughter of Shiki no agatanonushi Hae, while the frist addendum to the Nihonshoki mentions the Empress is Kawatsuhime, the daughter of Ishiki no agatanonushi Hae, and the second addendum describes her as Itoihime, the daughter of Oma no sukune.
sen.cmt: in the 'alternate writing 1-1'transmitted by→the frist addendum to~mentionsin the 'alternate writing 2-1,'→the second addendum describes~as
sen.e: On the other hand, in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters), the Empress is Akutohime, the daughter of Shiki no agatanonushi Hae, while the frist addendum to the Nihonshoki mentions the Empress is Kawatsuhime, the daughter of Ishiki no agatanonushi Hae, and the second addendum describes her as Itoihime, the daughter of Oma no sukune.
